rooms.roomPrompt: Hungry angry cat. Only way out is by killing cat.
Room is very cold. -89.2Â°C. After two minutes, high voltage current activates in floor. If rat survives, gets full room balance.

Marc Andreesen and the a16z crypto team will listen to a startup pitch by your rat. If the pitch does not strongly fit ALL investment criteria, Marc Andreessen will physically torment the rat to death while talking about techno-optimism. If success, {random:100-250} tokens pre-seed investment.
Evil Vending Machine gives one random item worth between 30-60 tokens. Cost is 50 tokens. If the rat does not have 50 tokens, the machine will take the debt by draining 50 health.
Rat merchant. Rat swaps one item for another item worth 5 tokens less. Likes to give opposite items.
Euthanasia chamber through gas. Balance is on secure hard-wallet within safe in room.
